title: 无尽幸运方块哪里下载
author: NLZDY656668289
txt_content: 找了半天没有找到无尽幸运方块，要1.12.2的，如果有别的附属可以可以留一个下载连接吗？

replies.author: canglongbeta
replies.txt_content: https://www.curseforge.com/minec ... ucky-block-avaritia，前置幸运方块，安装方式：放入.minecraft/addons/Lucky_Block，如有帮助请给最佳

replies.author: A55778866579
replies.txt_content:
